scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test  npm run pretest && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=html mocha ./tests/*.test.js --recursive --exit
scripts.resetdb: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./seeders/test
scripts.seedtasksdata: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./seeders/dev
